div.h2: Line Primary Payer Code (if not Medicare)

div.p: The code specifying a federal non-Medicare program or other source that has primary responsibility for the payment of the Medicare beneficiary's medical bills relating to the line item service on the non-institutional claim. The presence of a primary payer code indicates that some other payer besides Medicare covered at least some portion of the charges. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/linebeneprmrypyrcd
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

name.value: Line Primary Payer Code (if not Medicare)

description.value: The code specifying a federal non-Medicare program or other source that has primary responsibility for the payment of the Medicare beneficiary's medical bills relating to the line item service on the non-institutional claim. The presence of a primary payer code indicates that some other payer besides Medicare covered at least some portion of the charges. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/line_bene_prmry_pyr_cd
